Articles.Content: Shuts off the breaker to the computer block, plunging the ship into darkness... Not this time, Xannari...

> 
> Negative, Laythe, this also happens to be my ride home. XO, you have the bridge!
> XO- where are you going?
> 
> (prepares sidearm) I'm going after her. I have had it up to here with her insolence.

<10 kilometer ship appears>

<reads uss="" discovery="" ii=""></reads>

Detonate the ship, Sampa, I'll beam your crew up!

99% complete. Uplink terminated.

What!? ...Ah, close enough. I got what I really needed anyway.

Alright. Computer, head to these landscape coordinates and open the doors! As soon as I get onboard, jump to Helix Factor 2!

> 
> [For your information, good sir, I work alone in this department. Having an army would slow me down]

What about the automated fleet my destroyer detected? Did you think nobody knew about that?
Fire on that ship! \*Thank god I put a bunch of kitten photos on that computer...\*

> 
> What about the automated fleet my destroyer detected? Did you think nobody knew about that?

[i'm not joking. I am legit alone. Read the texts from earlier]
I send BOT (Biomechanical onslaught trooper) platoon 5 to cut off Xannari.

> 
> 99% complete. Uplink terminated.
> What!? ...Ah, close enough. I got what I really needed anyway.
> 
> Alright. Computer, head to these landscape coordinates and open the doors! As soon as I get onboard, jump to Helix Factor 2!

[1 Life signature detected outside ship]

Beam em' up!

What the -- 

Its Xannari!
Bot platoon 1-4 go after xannari! Lethal force authorized!
beam her directly to a holding cell, and don't let any males near her...or robots

> 
> [i'm not joking. I am legit alone. Read the texts from earlier]

Hmmm.. Must be a decoy. Clever, clever.....

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> beam her directly to a holding cell, and don't let any males near her...or robots

Got it. I beamed her directly into a Kinemet holding cell. Nothing can get out. Nothing. Set course to Kerbol-Jool-Laythe-100km orbit. Everyone meet me at Laythe.

Computer! Make the jump! Don't mind the proximity to the hull! Sorry about this. I know you just repaired the ship...

**Jumps to Helix Factor 2, blowing the side of your ship off... again**

Good god that was close.

[Wait, what is going on? Things are not making sense anymore]
I send BOT Platoon 6 after Xannari
Oh, and the Citadel should be located just above Jool's atmosphere. The ionizing radiation will hide its signature and view will be awesome.

Sir... should we chase her?

negative, let her go...

But, the data...

\*chuckles\*

Sir?

That data, is just a bunch of Kitten pictures!
No. It's located in the center of all our borders.

> 
> Computer! Make the jump! Don't mind the proximity to the hull! Sorry about this. I know you just repaired the ship...
> **Jumps to Helix Factor 2, blowing the side of your ship off... again**
> 
> Good god that was close.
> 
> [Wait, what is going on? Things are not making sense anymore]

Xannari has been split into 2 personalities! One good, one evil!
The Citadel
yeah, a rule I made for fairness and to ensure that no one faction has all the power
Ok. But now there's 2 Xannaris! We're Doomed
Lolcats is broken. Can I have those kitten pics? My army needs cat pics to keep morale up.

I believe the one you have in your holding cell is no doubt a robotic copy...clever girl... cut its power but do not destroy its circuitry, we could use this for more data... take it to the citadel but check to make sure there is no tracking device on it...
Wait. Sampa, send someone to the computer room. Xannari could have planted a remote transmitter. That would enable her to access all files remotely.
Alright. And about those kitten pictures...

> 
> Wait. Sampa, send someone to the computer room. Xannari could have planted a remote transmitter. That would enable her to access all files remotely.

already enroute...s\*\*\*, EVERYONE CLEAR OUT, NOW! \*explosion sound\*
